# CI/CD Badge Examples

Add these badges to your README.md:

## GitHub Actions

```markdown
![CI](https://github.com/your-org/smarttub-mqtt/workflows/CI/badge.svg)
![Release](https://github.com/your-org/smarttub-mqtt/workflows/Release/badge.svg)
```

## Codecov

```markdown
[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/your-org/smarttub-mqtt/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/your-org/smarttub-mqtt)
```

## Docker

```markdown
![Docker Image Size](https://img.shields.io/docker/image-size/your-org/smarttub-mqtt/latest)
![Docker Pulls](https://img.shields.io/docker/pulls/your-org/smarttub-mqtt)
```

```markdown
![Version](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/your-org/smarttub-mqtt)
```

## Example Header Section

```markdown
# SmartTub-MQTT

![CI](https://github.com/your-org/smarttub-mqtt/workflows/CI/badge.svg)
[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/your-org/smarttub-mqtt/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/your-org/smarttub-mqtt)
![Python Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3.11%2B-blue)
![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/your-org/smarttub-mqtt)

Bridge SmartTub OEM API with OpenHAB via MQTT, Web UI, and structured logging.
```
